timeline.message:
Migrate user permissions to grants

Fixes #8919
Clean up file structure and deduplicate code
Also migrate saved searches and event definition permissions
Don't fail on already existing grants

Handle grants update with different capabilies

Change DBGrantService.ensure() to allow updating grants
to a higher capability, but not to a lower one.

This is used by migrations that could try to create
different grants for the same target.
After all migrations are run, we will end up with the grant that
has the most powerful capability.

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure if using the #ordinal method of the enum will bite us at one point in the future. The value will change if the enums are reordered at some point. (e.g. someone wants them to be sorted alphabetically and refactors the order) How about adding an explicit priority value to each enum instead?
timeline.author: bernd

timeline.message: Use explicit capability priority instead of ordinal
